text: Sadou Hayatou (15 February 1942 – 1 August 2019) was a Cameroonian politician. Hayatou was the 4th Prime Minister of Cameroon from 26 April 1991 to 9 April 1992. He was born in Garoua, Cameroon. Hayatou died on 1 August 2019 at the age of 77.Décès de Sadou Hayatou, ancien Premier Ministre du Cameroun ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Cameroon
title: Sadou Hayatou
